mapper.select: SELECT comment.id , comment.deleted , comment.created_at as createdAt , comment.modified_at as modifiedAt , comment.author , comment.content FROM comment WHERE comment.id = #{id}

SELECT comment.id AS id, comment.author AS author, comment.content AS content, comment.testpost_id AS testpost_id FROM comment WHERE comment.id is not NULL AND comment.deleted is FALSE
AND comment.author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{author}, '%') ORDER BY comment.id ASC

SELECT comment.id FROM comment WHERE comment.id is not NULL AND comment.deleted is TRUE
AND comment.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY comment.id ASC
